page.title: 06HOUSING
page.content: There are different types of houses in our area - semi-detached,terraced, detached,bungalow and cottages.As with other towns houses are owned by the Council and Roseworth Estate is such a {housing}estate.You can buy the{council house if you wish and then you can extend the house.The houses usually have three bedrooms,a sitting room, dining room,kitchen,coalhouse,wash- house and a bathroom. { {Private}housing is found along Junction Road and in the village of Thorpe Thewles.Also in the latter are found cottages and older dwellings together with the more modern.In the rural areas there are farm houses. All houses have{main services}with toilets and bathrooms. At present there is some private housing development off the main artery road.
